remark.p: Non-career appointee. Secretary of State ad interim; Deputy Secretary of State; Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Germany); Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (France).
Ambassador to Germany from July 1969 to February 1972; thereafter Deputy Secretary of Defense
Ambassador to the Federal Republic of Germany, July 1969-February 1972; Deputy Secretary of Defense, February 1972-January 1973; Deputy Secretary of State, February 1973-May 1974

Deputy Secretary of Defense
